name: Citrus Fennel Salad

ingredients.name: crunchy romaine or iceberg lettuce
ingredients.additionalInstruction: washed, dried, and torn into bite-sized pieces

preparation: Cut grapefruits and oranges in half. Ream one half of each and reserve the juice. Use a grapefruit knife to remove sections of remaining halves and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine sections with fennel and onion. Add lettuce.
Whisk together reserved juice, honey, oil, and Molto Bene sauce. Drizzle over salad, toss gently, and serve.
tips: If you donâ€™t have fennel, try thin slices of crisp celery and raw carrot for that extra crunch.
